0.name: The Fool
0.upright: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, free spirit, adventure
0.reversed: Recklessness, taken advantage of, inconsideration, foolishness

1.name: The Magician
1.upright: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power, inspired action, willpower
1.reversed: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped talents, illusion

2.name: The High Priestess
2.upright: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, subconscious mind
2.reversed: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal, silence

3.name: The Empress
3.upright: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, abundance, creativity
3.reversed: Creative block, dependence on others, smothering, lack of growth

4.name: The Emperor
4.upright: Authority, establishment, structure, father figure, leadership
4.reversed: Tyranny, rigidity, coldness, domination, excessive control

5.name: The Hierophant
5.upright: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition, institutions
5.reversed: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo, rebellion

6.name: The Lovers
6.upright: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices
6.reversed: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values

7.name: The Chariot
7.reversed: Self-discipline, opposition, lack of direction, aggression

8.name: Strength
8.upright: Strength, courage, persuasion, influence, compassion, inner strength
8.reversed: Self doubt, low energy, raw emotion, weakness, lack of confidence

9.name: The Hermit
9.upright: Soul searching, introspection, inner guidance, seeking truth

10.name: Wheel of Fortune
10.upright: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, turning point
10.reversed: Bad luck, lack of control, clinging to control, external forces

11.name: Justice
11.upright: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law, accountability
11.reversed: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty, bias

12.name: The Hanged Man
12.upright: Suspension, restriction, letting go, sacrifice, martyrdom
12.reversed: Delays, resistance, stalling, indecision, lack of sacrifice

13.name: Death
13.upright: Endings, change, transformation, transition, new beginnings
13.reversed: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging

14.name: Temperance
14.upright: Balance, moderation, patience, purpose, meaning, tranquility
14.reversed: Imbalance, excess, self-healing, re-alignment, hasty decisions

15.name: The Devil
15.reversed: Release, freedom, revelation, reclaiming power, independence

16.name: The Tower
16.upright: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening
16.reversed: Personal transformation, fear of change, averting disaster

17.name: The Star
17.upright: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal, spirituality, healing
17.reversed: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection, pessimism

18.name: The Moon
18.upright: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious, intuition, dreams
18.reversed: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion, self-deception

19.name: The Sun
19.upright: Positivity, fun, warmth, success, vitality, joy, confidence
19.reversed: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic, pessimism

20.name: Judgement
20.upright: Judgement, rebirth, inner calling, absolution, awakening
20.reversed: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call, lack of self-awareness

21.name: The World
21.reversed: Seeking personal closure, short-cut to success, lack of achievement

ace.name: Ace of Wands
ace.reversed: An emerging idea, lack of direction, distractions, delays

two.name: Two of Wands
two.upright: Future planning, making decisions, leaving comfort zone
two.reversed: Personal goals, inner alignment, fear of unknown, lack of planning

three.name: Three of Wands
three.reversed: Playing small, lack of foresight, unexpected delays

four.name: Four of Wands

five.name: Five of Wands
five.reversed: Inner conflict, conflict avoidance, tension release

six.name: Six of Wands
six.reversed: Private achievement, personal definition of success, fall from grace

eight.name: Eight of Wands

nine.name: Nine of Wands

nine.reversed: Inner resources, struggle, overwhelm, defensive, paranoia

ten.name: Ten of Wands
ten.upright: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, completion
ten.reversed: Doing it all, carrying the burden, delegation, release

page.name: Page of Wands
page.upright: Inspiration, ideas, discovery, limitless potential, free spirit
page.reversed: Newly formed ideas, redirecting energy, self-limiting beliefs

knight.name: Knight of Wands
knight.upright: Energy, passion, inspired action, adventure, impulsiveness
knight.reversed: Passion project, haste, scattered energy, delays, frustration

queen.name: Queen of Wands
queen.upright: Courage, confidence, independence, social butterfly, determination
queen.reversed: Self-respect, self-confidence, introverted, re-establish sense of self

king.name: King of Wands
king.upright: Natural leader, vision, entrepreneur, honour, decisive
king.reversed: Impulsiveness, haste, ruthless, high expectations, forceful

page.name: Page of Cups

knight.name: Knight of Cups

queen.reversed: Inner feelings, self-care, self-love, co-dependency, emotional instability

king.upright: Emotionally balanced, compassionate, diplomatic, caring, big picture

ace.name: Ace of Swords
ace.upright: Breakthrough, clarity, sharp mind, new ideas, mental clarity
ace.reversed: Inner clarity, re-thinking an idea, clouded judgement, confusion

two.name: Two of Swords
two.upright: Difficult decisions, weighing up options, an impasse, avoidance

three.name: Three of Swords
three.upright: Heartbreak, emotional pain, sorrow, grief, hurt
three.reversed: Negative self-talk, releasing pain, optimism, forgiveness

five.name: Five of Swords
five.upright: Conflict, disagreements, competition, defeat, winning at all costs
five.reversed: Reconciliation, making amends, past resentment, open communication

six.name: Six of Swords
six.upright: Transition, change, rite of passage, releasing baggage, moving forward
six.reversed: Personal transition, resistance to change, unfinished business

seven.name: Seven of Swords
seven.upright: Betrayal, deception, getting away with something, acting strategically
seven.reversed: Imposter syndrome, self-deceit, keeping secrets, coming clean

eight.name: Eight of Swords
eight.upright: Negative thoughts, self-imposed restriction, imprisonment, victim mentality
eight.reversed: Self-limiting beliefs, inner critic, releasing negative thoughts, open to new perspectives

nine.name: Nine of Swords
nine.upright: Anxiety, worry, fear, depression, nightmares, isolation
nine.reversed: Inner turmoil, deep-seated fears, secrets, releasing worry

ten.name: Ten of Swords
ten.upright: Painful endings, deep wounds, betrayal, loss, crisis
ten.reversed: Recovery, regeneration, resisting an inevitable end, survival

page.name: Page of Swords
page.upright: New ideas, curiosity, thirst for knowledge, new ways of communicating
page.reversed: Self-expression, all talk and no action, haste, scattered energy

knight.name: Knight of Swords
knight.upright: Ambitious, action-oriented, driven to succeed, fast-thinking, impatient
knight.reversed: Restless energy, unfocused, impulsive, burn-out, scattered thoughts

queen.name: Queen of Swords
queen.upright: Independent, unbiased judgement, clear boundaries, direct communication
queen.reversed: Overly-emotional, easily influenced, bitchy, cold-hearted, cruel

king.name: King of Swords
king.upright: Mental clarity, intellectual power, authority, truth, clear thinking
king.reversed: Quiet power, inner truth, misuse of power, manipulation, tyranny

ace.name: Ace of Pentacles
ace.upright: A new financial or career opportunity, manifestation, abundance
ace.reversed: Lost opportunity, lack of planning and foresight, bad investment

two.name: Two of Pentacles
two.upright: Multiple priorities, time management, prioritisation, adaptability

three.name: Three of Pentacles
three.upright: Collaboration, learning, implementation, teamwork, shared goals
three.reversed: Disharmony, misalignment, working alone, lack of teamwork

four.name: Four of Pentacles
four.upright: Saving money, security, conservatism, scarcity, control

five.name: Five of Pentacles
five.upright: Financial loss, poverty, lack mindset, isolation, worry
five.reversed: Recovery from financial loss, spiritual poverty, inner security

six.name: Six of Pentacles
six.upright: Giving, receiving, sharing wealth, generosity, charity
six.reversed: Self-care, unpaid debts, one-sided charity, power dynamics

seven.name: Seven of Pentacles
seven.upright: Sustainable results, long-term view, reward for hard work, perseverance
seven.reversed: Lack of long-term vision, limited success or reward, impatience

eight.name: Eight of Pentacles
eight.upright: Apprenticeship, repetitive tasks, mastery, skill development, craftsmanship
eight.reversed: Self-development, perfectionism, misdirected activity, lack of motivation

nine.name: Nine of Pentacles
nine.upright: Abundance, luxury, self-sufficiency, financial independence, success
nine.reversed: Self-worth, over-investment in work, hustling, financial setbacks

ten.name: Ten of Pentacles
ten.upright: Wealth, financial security, family, long-term success, contribution
ten.reversed: The dark side of wealth, financial failure or loss, family conflicts

page.name: Page of Pentacles
page.upright: Manifestation, financial opportunity, skill development, new job
page.reversed: Lack of progress, procrastination, learn from failure, bad investment

knight.name: Knight of Pentacles
knight.upright: Hard work, productivity, routine, conservatism, methodical

queen.name: Queen of Pentacles
queen.upright: Nurturing, practical, providing financially, a working parent, resourcefulness
queen.reversed: Financial independence, self-care, work-home conflict, smothering

king.name: King of Pentacles
